articles.author: Kyle Wiggers
articles.title: Anthropic appears to be using Brave to power web search for its Claude chatbot - TechCrunch
articles.description: Some evidence suggests that Anthropic is using Brave to drive web searches for its AI-powered chatbot, Claude.
articles.content: Earlier this week, Anthropic rolled out a web search feature for its AI-powered chatbot platform, Claude, bringing the bot in line with many of its rivals. It wasn’t immediately clear which search in… [+1141 chars]
